culturalMealDetails.title: Vegetable Omelette
instructions: Whisk eggs with salt and pepper.
Sauté vegetables in a non-stick pan.
Pour eggs over vegetables and cook until set.
culturalMealDetails.fullText: vegetable omelette 2 eggs 1/4 cup bell peppers 1/4 cup spinach salt pepper whisk eggs with salt and pepper. sauté vegetables in a non-stick pan. pour eggs over vegetables and cook until set.

culturalMealDetails.title: Chickpea Salad
instructions: Rinse and drain chickpeas.
Chop cucumber and tomatoes.
Mix all ingredients in a bowl.
culturalMealDetails.fullText: chickpea salad 1 can chickpeas 1/2 cucumber 1/2 cup cherry tomatoes 1 tbsp olive oil lemon juice salt pepper rinse and drain chickpeas. chop cucumber and tomatoes. mix all ingredients in a bowl.

culturalMealDetails.title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: Heat oil in a pan.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
Add soy sauce and serve over rice.
culturalMealDetails.fullText: vegetable stir-fry 1 cup mixed vegetables 1 tbsp soy sauce 1 tsp sesame oil 1/2 cup cooked rice heat oil in a pan. add vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes. add soy sauce and serve over rice.

culturalMealDetails.title: Greek Yogurt with Honey and Nuts
instructions: Spoon yogurt into a bowl.
Drizzle honey on top and sprinkle nuts.
culturalMealDetails.fullText: greek yogurt with honey and nuts 1 cup greek yogurt 1 tbsp honey 2 tbsp mixed nuts spoon yogurt into a bowl. drizzle honey on top and sprinkle nuts.

culturalMealDetails.title: Caprese Sandwich
instructions: Slice the ciabatta roll.
Layer mozzarella, tomato, and basil.
Drizzle with balsamic glaze.
culturalMealDetails.fullText: caprese sandwich 1 ciabatta roll 1/2 cup fresh mozzarella 1 tomato basil leaves balsamic glaze slice the ciabatta roll. layer mozzarella, tomato, and basil. drizzle with balsamic glaze.

culturalMealDetails.title: Quinoa and Black Bean Bowl
instructions: Mix quinoa, black beans, corn, and lime juice in a bowl.
Top with sliced avocado.
culturalMealDetails.fullText: quinoa and black bean bowl 1 cup cooked quinoa 1 can black beans 1/2 avocado 1/4 cup corn lime juice mix quinoa, black beans, corn, and lime juice in a bowl. top with sliced avocado.

culturalMealDetails.title: Mediterranean Couscous
instructions: Cook couscous according to package instructions.
Mix in chopped tomatoes, olives, and feta.
culturalMealDetails.fullText: mediterranean couscous 1 cup couscous 1/2 cup cherry tomatoes 1/4 cup olives 1/4 cup feta olive oil cook couscous according to package instructions. mix in chopped tomatoes, olives, and feta.

culturalMealDetails.title: Vegetable Tacos
instructions: Warm tortillas in a pan.
Fill with sautéed vegetables and top with avocado and salsa.
culturalMealDetails.fullText: vegetable tacos 4 corn tortillas 1 cup mixed sautéed vegetables 1/2 avocado salsa warm tortillas in a pan. fill with sautéed vegetables and top with avocado and salsa.

culturalMealDetails.title: Lentil Soup
instructions: Sauté chopped onion, carrot, and celery.
Add lentils and broth, simmer for 15 minutes.
culturalMealDetails.fullText: lentil soup 1 can lentils 1 carrot 1 celery stalk 1 onion vegetable broth sauté chopped onion, carrot, and celery. add lentils and broth, simmer for 15 minutes.

culturalMealDetails.title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
instructions: Cut tops off peppers and remove seeds.
Mix rice, beans, and cumin, stuff into peppers, and bake for 15 minutes.
culturalMealDetails.fullText: stuffed bell peppers 2 bell peppers 1 cup cooked rice 1 can black beans 1 tsp cumin cut tops off peppers and remove seeds. mix rice, beans, and cumin, stuff into peppers, and bake for 15 minutes.

culturalMealDetails.title: Vegetable Sushi Rolls
instructions: Cook sushi rice and let cool.
Lay nori on a mat, spread rice, and add vegetables, roll tightly.
culturalMealDetails.fullText: vegetable sushi rolls 1 cup sushi rice nori sheets cucumber carrot avocado cook sushi rice and let cool. lay nori on a mat, spread rice, and add vegetables, roll tightly.

culturalMealDetails.title: Pasta Primavera
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Sauté vegetables in olive oil, mix with pasta and top with parmesan.
culturalMealDetails.fullText: pasta primavera 8 oz pasta 1 cup mixed vegetables 1/4 cup parmesan olive oil cook pasta according to package instructions. sauté vegetables in olive oil, mix with pasta and top with parmesan.

culturalMealDetails.title: Zucchini Noodles with Pesto
instructions: Spiralize zucchinis into noodles.
Sauté with pesto and halved cherry tomatoes.
culturalMealDetails.fullText: zucchini noodles with pesto 2 zucchinis 1/4 cup pesto 1/4 cup cherry tomatoes spiralize zucchinis into noodles. sauté with pesto and halved cherry tomatoes.

culturalMealDetails.title: Spinach and Feta Quiche
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F.
Whisk eggs and milk, mix in spinach and feta, pour into crust, bake for 25 minutes.
culturalMealDetails.fullText: spinach and feta quiche 1 pie crust 2 cups spinach 1/2 cup feta 3 eggs 1/2 cup milk preheat oven to 375°f. whisk eggs and milk, mix in spinach and feta, pour into crust, bake for 25 minutes.

culturalMealDetails.title: Vegetable Curry
instructions: Heat coconut milk and curry paste in a pan.
Add vegetables and simmer for 15 minutes, serve over rice.
culturalMealDetails.fullText: vegetable curry 1 can coconut milk 1 cup mixed vegetables 2 tbsp curry paste 1 cup cooked rice heat coconut milk and curry paste in a pan. add vegetables and simmer for 15 minutes, serve over rice.

instructions: Mix quinoa, black beans, corn, and lime juice in a bowl.
Top with sliced avocado.
extractedMeals.fullText: quinoa and black bean bowl 1 cup cooked quinoa 1 can black beans 1/2 avocado 1/4 cup corn lime juice mix quinoa, black beans, corn, and lime juice in a bowl. top with sliced avocado.

extractedMeals.title: Smoothie Bowl
instructions: Blend banana, spinach, and almond milk until smooth.
Pour into a bowl and add toppings.
extractedMeals.fullText: smoothie bowl 1 banana 1/2 cup spinach 1/2 cup almond milk toppings: granola, berries blend banana, spinach, and almond milk until smooth. pour into a bowl and add toppings.

instructions: Cook couscous according to package instructions.
Mix in chopped tomatoes, olives, and feta.
extractedMeals.fullText: mediterranean couscous 1 cup couscous 1/2 cup cherry tomatoes 1/4 cup olives 1/4 cup feta olive oil cook couscous according to package instructions. mix in chopped tomatoes, olives, and feta.

Fill with sautéed vegetables and top with avocado and salsa.
extractedMeals.fullText: vegetable tacos 4 corn tortillas 1 cup mixed sautéed vegetables 1/2 avocado salsa warm tortillas in a pan. fill with sautéed vegetables and top with avocado and salsa.

extractedMeals.title: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast the bread.
Mash avocado and spread on toast, season with salt and pepper.
extractedMeals.fullText: avocado toast 1 slice whole grain bread 1/2 avocado salt pepper toast the bread. mash avocado and spread on toast, season with salt and pepper.

Add lentils and broth, simmer for 15 minutes.

instructions: Mix chia seeds, almond milk, and maple syrup.
Refrigerate for at least 2 hours, serve with berries.
extractedMeals.fullText: chia seed pudding 1/4 cup chia seeds 1 cup almond milk 1 tbsp maple syrup berries mix chia seeds, almond milk, and maple syrup. refrigerate for at least 2 hours, serve with berries.

instructions: Warm falafel in a pan.
Place in wrap with lettuce, tomato, and drizzle with tahini.

prep_tips: Prep ingredients in advance to save time during cooking.
Use pre-cooked grains like quinoa or rice for quicker meal prep.
Keep a variety of spices and sauces on hand to enhance flavors.

culturalMealDetails.title: Chickpea Salad
instructions: Rinse and drain chickpeas.
Chop cucumber and tomato.
Mix all ingredients in a bowl.
culturalMealDetails.fullText: chickpea salad 1 can chickpeas 1 cucumber 1 tomato 2 tablespoons olive oil lemon juice salt pepper rinse and drain chickpeas. chop cucumber and tomato. mix all ingredients in a bowl.

culturalMealDetails.title: Stir-Fried Tofu and Vegetables
instructions: Press and cube tofu.
Heat oil in a pan, add tofu and cook until golden.
Add vegetables, soy sauce, and ginger; stir-fry until cooked.
culturalMealDetails.fullText: stir-fried tofu and vegetables 1 block firm tofu 2 cups mixed vegetables 2 tablespoons soy sauce 1 tablespoon sesame oil 1 teaspoon ginger press and cube tofu. heat oil in a pan, add tofu and cook until golden. add vegetables, soy sauce, and ginger; stir-fry until cooked.

culturalMealDetails.title: Quinoa and Black Bean Bowl
instructions: Mix quinoa and black beans in a bowl.
Top with diced avocado, lime juice, and cilantro.
culturalMealDetails.fullText: quinoa and black bean bowl 1 cup cooked quinoa 1 can black beans 1 avocado 1 lime cilantro mix quinoa and black beans in a bowl. top with diced avocado, lime juice, and cilantro.

culturalMealDetails.title: Mediterranean Stuffed Peppers
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F.
Cut tops off peppers and remove seeds.
Mix rice, chickpeas, tomatoes, and oregano; stuff into peppers.
Bake for 25 minutes.
culturalMealDetails.fullText: mediterranean stuffed peppers 2 bell peppers 1 cup cooked rice 1 can chickpeas 1/2 cup diced tomatoes 1 teaspoon oregano preheat oven to 375°f. cut tops off peppers and remove seeds. mix rice, chickpeas, tomatoes, and oregano; stuff into peppers. bake for 25 minutes.

culturalMealDetails.title: Lentil Soup
instructions: Chop onion, carrots, and celery.
Sauté vegetables in a pot, add lentils and broth; simmer until lentils are tender.
culturalMealDetails.fullText: lentil soup 1 cup lentils 1 onion 2 carrots 2 celery stalks 4 cups vegetable broth chop onion, carrots, and celery. sauté vegetables in a pot, add lentils and broth; simmer until lentils are tender.

culturalMealDetails.title: Zucchini Noodles with Marinara
instructions: Spiralize zucchinis into noodles.
Sauté in olive oil for 5 minutes, add marinara sauce and heat through.
culturalMealDetails.fullText: zucchini noodles with marinara 2 zucchinis 1 cup marinara sauce 1 tablespoon olive oil basil spiralize zucchinis into noodles. sauté in olive oil for 5 minutes, add marinara sauce and heat through.

culturalMealDetails.title: Sweet Potato and Black Bean Tacos
instructions: Roast diced sweet potatoes at 400°F for 20 minutes.
Warm tortillas, fill with sweet potatoes, black beans, and avocado; drizzle with lime.
culturalMealDetails.fullText: sweet potato and black bean tacos 2 sweet potatoes 1 can black beans corn tortillas avocado lime roast diced sweet potatoes at 400°f for 20 minutes. warm tortillas, fill with sweet potatoes, black beans, and avocado; drizzle with lime.

culturalMealDetails.title: Vegan Curry
instructions: Heat coconut milk and curry paste in a pot.
Add vegetables and chickpeas; simmer for 20 minutes.
culturalMealDetails.fullText: vegan curry 1 can coconut milk 1 cup mixed vegetables 2 tablespoons curry paste 1 cup chickpeas heat coconut milk and curry paste in a pot. add vegetables and chickpeas; simmer for 20 minutes.

culturalMealDetails.title: Vegan Sushi Rolls
instructions: Cook sushi rice according to package instructions.
Lay nori on a mat, spread rice, and add cucumber and avocado; roll tightly.
culturalMealDetails.fullText: vegan sushi rolls 1 cup sushi rice nori sheets 1 cucumber 1 avocado soy sauce cook sushi rice according to package instructions. lay nori on a mat, spread rice, and add cucumber and avocado; roll tightly.

culturalMealDetails.title: Cauliflower Tacos
instructions: Roast cauliflower florets at 400°F for 20 minutes.
Serve in tortillas with avocado, lime, and cilantro.
culturalMealDetails.fullText: cauliflower tacos 1 head cauliflower corn tortillas 1 avocado lime cilantro roast cauliflower florets at 400°f for 20 minutes. serve in tortillas with avocado, lime, and cilantro.

extractedMeals.title: Vegan Smoothie Bowl
instructions: Blend banana, spinach, and almond milk until smooth.
Pour into a bowl and top with chia seeds and granola.
extractedMeals.fullText: vegan smoothie bowl 1 banana 1 cup spinach 1 cup almond milk 1 tablespoon chia seeds 1/4 cup granola blend banana, spinach, and almond milk until smooth. pour into a bowl and top with chia seeds and granola.

culturalMealDetails.title: Vegetable Omelette
instructions: Whisk the eggs in a bowl.
Sauté the vegetables in a pan for 3-4 minutes.
Pour the eggs over the vegetables and cook until set.
culturalMealDetails.fullText: vegetable omelette 2 eggs 1/4 cup bell peppers 1/4 cup spinach 1/4 cup onions salt pepper whisk the eggs in a bowl. sauté the vegetables in a pan for 3-4 minutes. pour the eggs over the vegetables and cook until set.

culturalMealDetails.title: Quinoa Salad with Chickpeas
instructions: In a bowl, combine quinoa, chickpeas, tomatoes, and cucumber.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice, then season with salt and pepper.
culturalMealDetails.fullText: quinoa salad with chickpeas 1 cup cooked quinoa 1/2 cup canned chickpeas 1/4 cup cherry tomatoes 1/4 cup cucumber 2 tbsp olive oil lemon juice salt pepper in a bowl, combine quinoa, chickpeas, tomatoes, and cucumber. drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice, then season with salt and pepper.

culturalMealDetails.title: Stir-Fried Tofu with Broccoli
instructions: Press and cube the tofu.
Sauté garlic and ginger in sesame oil.
Add tofu and broccoli, stir-fry for 10-15 minutes, then add soy sauce.
culturalMealDetails.fullText: stir-fried tofu with broccoli 1 block firm tofu 2 cups broccoli 2 tbsp soy sauce 1 tbsp sesame oil 1 clove garlic 1 tsp ginger press and cube the tofu. sauté garlic and ginger in sesame oil. add tofu and broccoli, stir-fry for 10-15 minutes, then add soy sauce.

culturalMealDetails.title: Greek Yogurt with Berries
instructions: In a bowl, layer Greek yogurt, berries, and drizzle with honey.
Sprinkle chia seeds on top.
culturalMealDetails.fullText: greek yogurt with berries 1 cup greek yogurt 1/2 cup mixed berries 1 tbsp honey 1 tbsp chia seeds in a bowl, layer greek yogurt, berries, and drizzle with honey. sprinkle chia seeds on top.

culturalMealDetails.title: Mediterranean Chickpea Wrap
instructions: Spread hummus on the wrap.
Add chickpeas, cucumber, and tomatoes, then roll up.
culturalMealDetails.fullText: mediterranean chickpea wrap 1 gluten-free wrap 1/2 cup canned chickpeas 1/4 cup diced cucumber 1/4 cup diced tomatoes 2 tbsp hummus spread hummus on the wrap. add chickpeas, cucumber, and tomatoes, then roll up.

culturalMealDetails.title: Zucchini Noodles with Pesto
instructions: Spiralize the zucchinis into noodles.
Sauté in olive oil for 5 minutes, then add pesto and tomatoes.
culturalMealDetails.fullText: zucchini noodles with pesto 2 zucchinis 1/4 cup pesto 1/4 cup cherry tomatoes 1 tbsp olive oil salt pepper spiralize the zucchinis into noodles. sauté in olive oil for 5 minutes, then add pesto and tomatoes.

culturalMealDetails.title: Spicy Black Bean Salad
instructions: Rinse and drain black beans.
Mix all ingredients in a bowl and toss.
culturalMealDetails.fullText: spicy black bean salad 1 can black beans 1/2 cup corn 1/4 cup diced red onion 1/4 cup cilantro lime juice salt pepper rinse and drain black beans. mix all ingredients in a bowl and toss.

culturalMealDetails.title: Lentil Stir-Fry
instructions: Sauté garlic in sesame oil.
Add mixed vegetables and lentils, stir-fry for 10-15 minutes, then add soy sauce.
culturalMealDetails.fullText: lentil stir-fry 1 cup cooked lentils 1 cup mixed vegetables 2 tbsp soy sauce 1 tbsp sesame oil 1 clove garlic sauté garlic in sesame oil. add mixed vegetables and lentils, stir-fry for 10-15 minutes, then add soy sauce.

extractedMeals.title: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast the bread.
Mash the avocado and spread it on the toast, then season.

prep_tips: Prepare quinoa and lentils in advance to save time.
Chop vegetables ahead of time for quicker meal assembly.
